mapper.select:
select count(*) from bc_subarea inner join bc_region on bc_subarea.region_id = bc_region.id
and addresskey like '%'||#{condition.addresskey}||'%'
and province like '%'||#{condition.region.province}||'%'
and city like '%'||#{condition.region.city}||'%'
and district like '%'||#{condition.region.district}||'%'
and decidedzone_id = #{condition.decidedZone.id}

select ID, REGION_ID, ADDRESSKEY, STARTNUM, ENDNUM, SINGLE, POSITION, province, city , district from (select bc_subarea.ID, bc_subarea.REGION_ID, bc_subarea.ADDRESSKEY, bc_subarea.STARTNUM, bc_subarea.ENDNUM, bc_subarea.SINGLE, bc_subarea.POSITION, bc_region.province, bc_region.city, bc_region.district ,rownum RN from bc_subarea inner join bc_region on bc_subarea.region_id = bc_region.id where 1=1
and addresskey like '%'||#{condition.addresskey}||'%'
and province like '%'||#{condition.region.province}||'%'
and city like '%'||#{condition.region.city}||'%'
and district like '%'||#{condition.region.district}||'%'
and decidedzone_id = #{condition.decidedZone.id}
and rownum <= #{last}) where RN > #{first}

select bc_subarea.ID, bc_subarea.REGION_ID, bc_subarea.ADDRESSKEY, bc_subarea.STARTNUM, bc_subarea.ENDNUM, bc_subarea.SINGLE, bc_subarea.POSITION, bc_region.province, bc_region.city, bc_region.district from bc_subarea inner join bc_region on bc_subarea.region_id = bc_region.id
and addresskey like '%'||#{addresskey}||'%'
and province like '%'||#{region.province}||'%'
and city like '%'||#{region.city}||'%'
and district like '%'||#{region.district}||'%'
and decidedzone_id = #{decidedZone.id}
mapper.sql: ID, DECIDEDZONE_ID, REGION_ID, ADDRESSKEY, STARTNUM, ENDNUM, SINGLE, POSITION
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BC_SUBAREA WHERE DECIDEDZONE_ID IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into BJ0825.BC_SUBAREA (ID, DECIDEDZONE_ID, REGION_ID, ADDRESSKEY, STARTNUM, ENDNUM, SINGLE, POSITION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decidedZone.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addresskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{single,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
DECIDEDZONE_ID,

mapper.update:
update BJ0825.BC_SUBAREA
DECIDEDZONE_ID = #{decidedzoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESSKEY = #{addresskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTNUM = #{startnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDNUM = #{endnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SINGLE = #{single,jdbcType=CHAR},
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
